cz.melkamar.andruian.viewlink.data.location

Class LocationHelperImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.melkamar.andruian.viewlink.data.location.LocationHelperImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.location.LocationListener, LocationHelper

    public class LocationHelperImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.location.LocationListener, LocationHelper
    A helper class for Location management. It handles asking for permissions and sending updates about location change to a specified LocationListener.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocationHelperImpl

        public LocationHelperImpl(android.support.v7.app.AppCompatActivity activity,
                          android.location.LocationListener locationListener)
        Create a new LocationHelperImpl.
        Parameters:
        activity - The activity requesting location. It must override the FragmentActivity.onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) method. This method shall call onRequestPermissionsResult(int, String[], int[]) with the given parameters.
        locationListener - A listener where GPS updates will be sent to.

      • isReportingGps

        public boolean isReportingGps()

                                       @NonNull
                                       java.lang.String[] permissions,

                                throws PermissionException
        Callback for when permission request is resolved by the user, either accepting or denying the request.
        Specified by:
        onRequestPermissionsResult in interface LocationHelper
        Parameters:
        requestCode - The code of the request. This is passed to the Android framework in requestPermissions().
        permissions -
        grantResults - The results if the permission request.
        Throws:
        PermissionException - Thrown when the permission request was denied.
